modName: ESO Nord Armor by NewerMind43 - Levelled List
summary: Adds the ESO Nord Armor to the levelled lists for NPCs.
descriptionHtml:
Thanks to [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2959649/?]NewerMind43[/url][/b] for the original armour set. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68530/?]Check it out here[/url]. A shoutout to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6403446/?]Formalitus[/url] for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34000/?]levelled list creation tool[/url].
[img]http://i.imgur.com/FsB1q1F.png[/img]
This mod adds the ESO Nord Armor to the levelled lists of NPCs using steel armor as this set has the same stats as steel armor.

Installation:
1. Install the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68530/?]original armor set[/url] as normal. Feel free to use your favourite retexture of this armor. 
2. Install this mod overwriting/merging as requested (this mod only contains a .esp)
3. Install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34000/?]ELLC
[/url]This is a master file so needs to be placed above the ESO Nord Armor by NewerMind43.esp in your loader order like this: 
[img]http://i.imgur.com/e47hYaa.png[/img]
4. Use TES5Edit Merged Patch and Wyre Bash Bashed Patch to use alongside levelled lists from other mods. Tutorials can be found here for Mod Organizer users:
[youtube]BtLolEgVMTg[/youtube][youtube]W1Es06MtAZM[/youtube]

Have fun with a greater armour variety in your game!

Armour Stats

Gender - Male 

Armor: 31
Boots: 12
Gloves: 12
Helmet: 17

If you want to make your own levelled lists using ELLC please see this [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vq1qdH2-k3c]video[/url].
author: boomslang17
